name: VrcGravityController
author: ITR, lil-fluff, BLANKE
description: Gives you control over local gravity. Check https://github.com/ITR13/MelonGravityController/blob/master/README.md for details
changelog: Pulled PRs. Updated world check. Made mod compatible with other mods that control gravity (noclip). Fixed bug when releasing hold key before trigger.
